alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 4:01AM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the southern Adirondacks and the Lake George Saratoga region in eastern New York and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates may exceed one inch per hour at times tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton
